template.name: gzn_parent_view
template.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:id="@+id/parent" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent">
<include layout="@layout/widget_bg" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="0dp" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent"/>
<androidx.core.widget.NestedScrollView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="0dp" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" android:fillViewport="true">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="vertical">
<com.google.android.material.appbar.AppBarLayout style="@style/MyAppbarLayout" android:background="@color/white">
<com.google.android.material.appbar.MaterialToolbar style="@style/MyMaterialToolbar">
<LinearLayout android:gravity="center" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content">
<ImageButton android:id="@+id/btn_back" style="@style/MyCostumToolbarImage" android:src="@drawable/mygzn_keyboard_arrow_left" android:tag="CostumToolbarImage" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tv_toolbar" style="@style/MyCostumToolbarTitle" android:text="MyCostumToolbarTitle" />
<ImageButton android:id="@+id/btn_popup" style="@style/MyOptionMenu" android:src="@drawable/mygzn_more_vert" /> </LinearLayout> </com.google.android.material.appbar.MaterialToolbar> </com.google.android.material.appbar.AppBarLayout>
<View style="@style/MyDivider.Toolbar" />
<LinearLayout style="@style/MyParentType">
</LinearLayout> </LinearLayout> </androidx.core.widget.NestedScrollView> </androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

template.name: gzn_MyRadioGroup
template.value:
<RadioGroup android:id="@+id/rg_$id$" style="@style/MyRadioGroup" android:checkedButton="@+id/rb_first">
<RadioButton android:id="@+id/rb_first" style="@style/MyRadioButton" android:text="MyRadioButton" /> </RadioGroup>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content">
<androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:id="@+id/cv" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginLeft="@dimen/def_margin" android:layout_marginTop="@dimen/def_margin_half" android:layout_marginRight="@dimen/def_margin" android:layout_marginBottom="@dimen/def_margin_half" app:cardCornerRadius="@dimen/radius">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_margin="@dimen/def_margin" android:orientation="vertical">
</LinearLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView> </LinearLayout>

template.name: gzn_rv_init_adapter
gzn_tv_content
template.value:
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="@dimen/space" android:orientation="vertical">
<TextView style="@style/MyTextContent.Small.Grey.Light" android:text="$hint$" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tv_$id$" style="@style/MyTextContent" android:layout_marginTop="5dp" android:text="$hint$" /> </LinearLayout>

template.name: gzn_adapter
gzn_single_image
template.value:
<LinearLayout android:layout_marginBottom="@dimen/def_margin" android:layout_marginTop="@dimen/def_margin" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:gravity="center" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/img" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:scaleType="center" android:src="@drawable/ic_baseline_add_a_photo_24" />
</LinearLayout>

template.name: gzn_parent_view_single_foto
template.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:id="@+id/parent" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="0dp" android:fillViewport="true" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="vertical">
<com.google.android.material.appbar.AppBarLayout style="@style/MyAppbarLayout" android:background="@color/white">
<com.google.android.material.appbar.MaterialToolbar style="@style/MyMaterialToolbar">
<LinearLayout android:gravity="center" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content">
<ImageButton android:id="@+id/btn_back" style="@style/MyCostumToolbarImage" android:src="@drawable/mygzn_keyboard_arrow_left" android:tag="CostumToolbarImage" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tv_toolbar" style="@style/MyCostumToolbarTitle" android:text="Single Foto" /> </LinearLayout> </com.google.android.material.appbar.MaterialToolbar> </com.google.android.material.appbar.AppBarLayout>
<View style="@style/MyDivider.Toolbar" />
<LinearLayout style="@style/MyParentType" android:gravity="center">
<LinearLayout android:layout_marginBottom="@dimen/def_margin" android:layout_marginTop="@dimen/def_margin" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:gravity="center" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/img_foto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:scaleType="centerInside" android:src="@drawable/ic_baseline_add_a_photo_24" />
</LinearLayout>
<Button android:id="@+id/btn_simpan" style="@style/MyButtonContained" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:text="Ambil Foto" /> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout> </androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

template.name: gzn_radio_button
template.value:
<TextView style="@style/MyTextHeader" android:layout_marginTop="0dp" android:text="Pilih Product Category" />
<com.gzeinnumer.dr.DynamicRadioButton android:id="@+id/dr_" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="@dimen/def_margin_half" app:style="@style/def_radioButtonStyle" />

<ImageButton android:id="@+id/btn_popup" style="@style/MyOptionMenu" android:src="@drawable/mygzn_more_vert" /> </LinearLayout> </com.google.android.material.appbar.MaterialToolbar> </com.google.android.material.appbar.AppBarLayout>

</LinearLayout> </LinearLayout> </androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_margin="@dimen/def_margin" android:orientation="vertical" tools:ignore="UselessParent">
</LinearLayout> </LinearLayout>

template.name: gzn_paging_v2_parent_view_tablayout
template.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:id="@+id/parent" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent">
<androidx.core.widget.NestedScrollView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="0dp" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" android:fillViewport="true">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="vertical">
<com.google.android.material.appbar.AppBarLayout style="@style/MyAppbarLayout" android:background="@color/white">
<com.google.android.material.appbar.MaterialToolbar style="@style/MyMaterialToolbar">
<LinearLayout android:gravity="center" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content">
<ImageButton android:id="@+id/btn_back" style="@style/MyCostumToolbarImage" android:src="@drawable/mygzn_keyboard_arrow_left" android:tag="CostumToolbarImage" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tv_toolbar" style="@style/MyCostumToolbarTitle" android:text="Product" />
<ImageButton android:id="@+id/btn_popup" style="@style/MyOptionMenu" android:src="@drawable/mygzn_more_vert" /> </LinearLayout> </com.google.android.material.appbar.MaterialToolbar> </com.google.android.material.appbar.AppBarLayout>
<View style="@style/MyDivider.Toolbar" />
<androidx.swiperefreshlayout.widget.SwipeRefreshLayout android:id="@+id/swipeRefreshLayout" style="@style/swipeRefreshLayoutV1">
<LinearLayout style="@style/MyParentType.List"> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="vertical">
<LinearLayout android:id="@+id/ll_filter_text" style="@style/MyLinearLayout.White" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:layout_marginTop="@dimen/space_half" android:visibility="gone" tools:visibility="visible">
<TextView android:id="@+id/tv_filter_text" style="@style/MyTextContent" android:text="2021-12-27 sd 2021-12-28" android:textColor="@color/colorPrimary" />
<ImageView android:id="@+id/img_clear_filter" android:layout_marginStart="@dimen/def_margin_half" android:src="@drawable/ic_baseline_cancel_24" android:layout_width="15dp" android:layout_height="15dp" android:layout_marginLeft="@dimen/def_margin_half" />
</LinearLayout>
<com.google.android.material.tabs.TabLayout android:id="@+id/tab_layout" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="@dimen/space_half" android:background="@color/white" app:tabIndicatorColor="@color/colorAccent" app:tabSelectedTextColor="@color/colorAccent" app:tabTextAppearance="@style/TabLayoutText" app:tabTextColor="@color/grey_500">
<com.google.android.material.tabs.TabItem android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="All" />
<com.google.android.material.tabs.TabItem android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="2022-05" />
</com.google.android.material.tabs.TabLayout>
<androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/rv" style="@style/LLEmptyStateRV" android:visibility="gone" tools:itemCount="3" tools:listitem="@layout/item_product" tools:visibility="visible" />
<LinearLayout android:id="@+id/imgEmpty" style="@style/LLEmptyState" android:visibility="gone" tools:visibility="visible">
<ImageView style="@style/LLEmptyStateImage" android:src="@drawable/img_no_data_v3" />
</LinearLayout> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout> </androidx.swiperefreshlayout.widget.SwipeRefreshLayout> </LinearLayout> </androidx.core.widget.NestedScrollView> </androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

template.name: gzn_paging_v2_parent_view
template.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:id="@+id/parent" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent">
<androidx.core.widget.NestedScrollView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="0dp" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" android:fillViewport="true">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="vertical">
<com.google.android.material.appbar.AppBarLayout style="@style/MyAppbarLayout" android:background="@color/white">
<com.google.android.material.appbar.MaterialToolbar style="@style/MyMaterialToolbar">
<LinearLayout android:gravity="center" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content">
<ImageButton android:id="@+id/btn_back" style="@style/MyCostumToolbarImage" android:src="@drawable/mygzn_keyboard_arrow_left" android:tag="CostumToolbarImage" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tv_toolbar" style="@style/MyCostumToolbarTitle" android:text="Product" />
<ImageButton android:id="@+id/btn_popup" style="@style/MyOptionMenu" android:src="@drawable/mygzn_more_vert" /> </LinearLayout> </com.google.android.material.appbar.MaterialToolbar> </com.google.android.material.appbar.AppBarLayout>
<View style="@style/MyDivider.Toolbar" />
<androidx.swiperefreshlayout.widget.SwipeRefreshLayout android:id="@+id/swipeRefreshLayout" style="@style/swipeRefreshLayoutV1">
<LinearLayout style="@style/MyParentType.List"> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="vertical">
<LinearLayout android:id="@+id/ll_filter_text" style="@style/MyLinearLayout.White" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:layout_marginTop="@dimen/space_half" android:visibility="gone" tools:visibility="visible">
<TextView android:id="@+id/tv_filter_text" style="@style/MyTextContent" android:text="2021-12-27 sd 2021-12-28" android:textColor="@color/colorPrimary" />
<ImageView android:id="@+id/img_clear_filter" android:layout_marginStart="@dimen/def_margin_half" android:src="@drawable/ic_baseline_cancel_24" android:layout_width="15dp" android:layout_height="15dp" android:layout_marginLeft="@dimen/def_margin_half" />
</LinearLayout>
<androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/rv" style="@style/LLEmptyStateRV" android:visibility="gone" tools:itemCount="3" tools:listitem="@layout/item_product" tools:visibility="visible" />
<LinearLayout android:id="@+id/imgEmpty" style="@style/LLEmptyState" android:visibility="gone" tools:visibility="visible">
<ImageView style="@style/LLEmptyStateImage" android:src="@drawable/img_no_data_v3" />
</LinearLayout> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout> </androidx.swiperefreshlayout.widget.SwipeRefreshLayout> </LinearLayout> </androidx.core.widget.NestedScrollView> </androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

template.name: gzn_paging_v2_style
template.value:
<style name="CustomDialogStyleFilter" parent="Theme.MaterialComponents.Light.Dialog"> <item name="android:windowMinWidthMajor">80%</item> <item name="android:windowMinWidthMinor">80%</item> <item name="android:windowEnterAnimation">@anim/anim_in</item> <item name="android:windowExitAnimation">@anim/anim_out</item> <item name="colorPrimary">@color/colorPrimary</item> <item name="colorPrimaryVariant">@color/colorPrimaryDark</item> <item name="colorOnPrimary">@color/white</item> </style>
<style name="swipeRefreshLayoutV1"> <item name="android:layout_width">match_parent</item> <item name="android:layout_height">0dp</item> <item name="android:layout_weight">1</item> </style>
<style name="LLEmptyStateRV"> <item name="android:layout_width">match_parent</item> <item name="android:layout_height">0dp</item> <item name="android:layout_weight">1</item> <item name="android:overScrollMode">never</item> </style>
<style name="LLEmptyState"> <item name="android:layout_width">match_parent</item> <item name="android:layout_height">0dp</item> <item name="android:layout_weight">1</item> <item name="android:gravity">center</item> <item name="android:orientation">vertical</item> </style>
<style name="LLEmptyStateImage"> <item name="android:layout_width">300dp</item> <item name="android:layout_height">wrap_content</item> <item name="android:adjustViewBounds">true</item> <item name="android:scaleType">fitCenter</item> <item name="android:src">@drawable/img_no_data_v3</item> </style>
<style name="TabLayoutText" parent="TextAppearance.Design.Tab"> <item name="textAllCaps">false</item> </style>

template.name: gzn_paging_v2_base_activity
gzn_dialog_filter_view
template.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:id="@+id/dialog_canvas" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:layout_gravity="center_vertical|bottom" android:background="@drawable/filter_background_color" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="@dimen/def_margin">
<TextView style="@style/MyTextHeader" android:layout_gravity="center" android:layout_marginTop="0dp" android:text="Silahkan Pilih Filter" />
<View style="@style/MyDivider" android:background="@color/colorPrimary" />
<TextView style="@style/MyTextHeader" android:text="Pilih Tanggal" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:id="@+id/ed_start_date_p" style="@style/MyAutoCompleteTextViewFilledBox.V2" android:layout_marginTop="@dimen/space" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:hint="Start Date" app:endIconMode="none">
<AutoCompleteTextView android:id="@+id/ed_start_date" style="@style/MyAutoCompleteTextView.V2" />
</com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:id="@+id/ed_end_date_p" style="@style/MyAutoCompleteTextViewFilledBox.V2" android:layout_marginTop="@dimen/space" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="@dimen/def_margin" android:layout_marginLeft="@dimen/def_margin" android:layout_weight="1" android:hint="End Date" app:endIconMode="none">
<AutoCompleteTextView android:id="@+id/ed_end_date" style="@style/MyAutoCompleteTextView.V2" />
</com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
</LinearLayout>
<View style="@style/MyDivider" android:background="@color/colorPrimary" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="@dimen/space_half" android:gravity="center">
<Button android:id="@+id/btn_pilih_ulang" style="@style/MyButtonOutlined" android:text="Pilih Ulang" />
<Button android:id="@+id/btn_pilih" style="@style/MyButtonContained" android:layout_marginStart="@dimen/def_margin" android:layout_marginLeft="@dimen/def_margin" android:text="Pilih" /> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout>

template.name: gzn_paging_v2_filter_dialog
template.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:id="@+id/dialog_canvas" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:layout_gravity="center_vertical|bottom" android:background="@drawable/filter_background_color" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="@dimen/def_margin">
<TextView style="@style/MyTextHeader" android:layout_gravity="center" android:layout_marginTop="0dp" android:text="Silahkan Pilih Filter" />
<View style="@style/MyDivider" android:background="@color/colorPrimary" />
<TextView style="@style/MyTextHeader" android:text="Pilih Tanggal" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:id="@+id/ed_start_date_p" style="@style/MyAutoCompleteTextViewFilledBox.V2" android:layout_marginTop="@dimen/space" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:hint="Start Date" app:endIconMode="none">
<AutoCompleteTextView android:id="@+id/ed_start_date" style="@style/MyAutoCompleteTextView.V2" />
</com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:id="@+id/ed_end_date_p" style="@style/MyAutoCompleteTextViewFilledBox.V2" android:layout_marginTop="@dimen/space" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="@dimen/def_margin" android:layout_marginLeft="@dimen/def_margin" android:layout_weight="1" android:hint="End Date" app:endIconMode="none">
<AutoCompleteTextView android:id="@+id/ed_end_date" style="@style/MyAutoCompleteTextView.V2" />
</com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
</LinearLayout>
<View style="@style/MyDivider" android:background="@color/colorPrimary" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="@dimen/space_half" android:gravity="center">
<Button android:id="@+id/btn_pilih_ulang" style="@style/MyButtonOutlined" android:text="Pilih Ulang" />
<Button android:id="@+id/btn_pilih" style="@style/MyButtonContained" android:layout_marginStart="@dimen/def_margin" android:layout_marginLeft="@dimen/def_margin" android:text="Pilih" /> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout>
